pinyin: di4 yi1 xing2 tang2 niao4 bing4
di4 er4 xing2 tang2 niao4 bing4

sentences.english: Nathan noted that the study can't prove that smoking causes diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 内森说此项研究不能证明吸烟会导致糖尿病。

sentences.english: Will insulin analogs improve my diabetes treatment plan?
sentences.chinese: 胰岛素类似物会改善我的糖尿病治疗计划吗？

sentences.english: This rise has been paralleled by an increase in fluid milk intake.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病发病率的上升是与液体奶摄入量的增加并行的。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the relationship between serum resistin levels and type 2 diabetes mellitus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨人血清抵抗素水平与2型糖尿病的关系。

sentences.english: Maternal diabetes increases the risk of fetal macrosomia and shoulder dystocia.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病孕妇生育巨大胎儿及发生肩难产的危险性增加。

sentences.english: Take your diabetes meds as prescribed.
sentences.chinese: 按照医生的规定服用糖尿病药物。

sentences.english: Conclusion: Qiancao Mixture can decrease the urinary albumin of early aged diabetic nephropathy.
sentences.chinese: 结论茜草合剂可以降低早期糖尿病肾病的蛋白尿。

sentences.english: Results:Diabetic maculopathy was found in 35 of 83 patients with type 2 diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 结果在83例糖尿病病人中，有黄斑病变患者35例。

sentences.english: Objective:To evaluate the clinical effect of Seng-Yu decoction on Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价生玉汤治疗2型糖尿病的临床疗效。

sentences.english: He is also the author of Dr. Neal Barnard's Program for Reversing Diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 他还著有《巴纳德医生治愈糖尿病程序》一书。

sentences.english: Read about about the causes of diabetes and how to prevent it.
sentences.chinese: 读一些关于糖尿病的诱因并学会如何做好预防措施。

sentences.english: Tamitha, who had diabetes and ulcers, began to tremble.
sentences.chinese: 患有糖尿病和溃疡的塔米莎不禁冷得开始打颤。

sentences.english: It fights obesity, diabetes, and heart disease all day.
sentences.chinese: 早餐整天都与肥胖症，糖尿病，心脏病做斗争。

sentences.english: Diabetic mouse models were established by intravenous injection of alloxan tetrahydrate.
sentences.chinese: 四氧嘧啶尾静脉注射制作糖尿病小鼠模型。

sentences.english: In diabetes, there is too much sugar in the blood.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病是血液里有太多糖。

sentences.english: Diabetes mellitus is a group of diseases characterized by high levels of blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: “糖尿病”是一类表现为高血糖的病症的统称。

definition: chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly
